verses.t: Then{G5119} Pilate{G3588} therefore{G3767} took{G2983} Jesus{G3588}, and{G2532} scourged{G3146} him.

And{G2532} the soldiers{G3588} platted{G4120} a crown{G4735} of{G1537} thorns{G173}, and put{G2007} it on{G2007} his{G846} head{G3588}, and{G2532} they put on{G4016} him{G846} a purple{G4210} robe{G2440},
And{G2532} said{G3004}, Hail{G5463}, King{G3588} of the Jews{G2453}! and{G2532} they smote{G1325} him{G846} with their hands{G4475}.

Then{G3767} came{G1831} Jesus{G3588} forth{G1854}, wearing{G5409} the crown{G4735} of thorns{G174}, and{G2532} the purple{G4210} robe{G2440}. And{G2532} Pilate saith{G3004} unto them{G846}, Behold{G1492} the man{G3588}!

When{G3753} the chief priests{G3588} therefore{G3767} and{G2532} officers{G3588} saw{G1492} him{G846}, they cried out{G2905}, saying{G3004}, Crucify{G4717} him, crucify{G4717} him. The Jews{G2453} answered{G611} him{G846}, We{G2249} have{G2192} a law{G3551}, and{G2532} by{G2596} our{G2257} law{G3588} he ought{G3784} to die{G599}, because{G3754} he made{G4160} himself{G1438} the Son{G5207} of God{G2316}.
When{G3753} Pilate{G3588} therefore{G3767} heard{G191} that{G5126} saying{G3588}, he was{G5399} the more{G3123} afraid{G5399};

And{G2532} went{G1525} again{G3825} into{G1519} the judgment hall{G3588}, and{G2532} saith{G3004} unto Jesus{G3588}, Whence{G4159} art{G1488} thou{G4771}? But{G1161} Jesus{G2424} gave{G1325} him{G846} no{G3756} answer{G612}.

Then{G3767} saith{G3004} Pilate{G3588} unto him{G846}, Speakest thou{G2980} not{G3756} unto me{G1698}? knowest thou{G1492} not{G3756} that{G3754} I have{G2192} power{G1849} to crucify{G4717} thee{G4571}, and{G2532} have{G2192} power{G1849} to release{G630} thee{G4571}?

Jesus{G3588} answered{G611}, Thou couldest have{G2192} no{G3762} power{G1849} at all against{G2596} me{G1700}, except{G1487} it were{G2258} given{G1325} thee{G4671} from above{G509}: therefore{G1223} he that{G5124} delivered{G3860} me{G3165} unto thee{G4671} hath{G2192} the greater{G3173} sin{G266}.

And from{G1537} thenceforth{G5127} Pilate{G3588} sought to{G2212} release{G630} him{G846}: but{G1161} the Jews{G2453} cried out{G2896}, saying{G3004}, If{G1437} thou let{G630} this man{G5126} go{G630}, thou art{G1488} not{G3756} Cæsar's{G3588} friend{G5384}: whosoever{G3956} maketh{G4160} himself{G846} a king{G935} speaketh against{G483} Cæsar{G3588}.

When Pilate{G4091} therefore{G3767} heard{G191} that{G5126} saying{G3588}, he brought{G71} Jesus{G3588} forth{G1854}, and{G2532} sat down{G2523} in{G1909} the judgment seat{G3588} in{G1519} a place{G5117} that is called{G3004} the Pavement{G3038}, but{G1161} in the Hebrew{G1447}, Gabbatha{G1042}.

And{G1161} it was{G2258} the preparation{G3904} of the passover{G3957}, and{G1161} about{G5616} the sixth{G1623} hour{G5610}: and{G2532} he saith{G3004} unto the Jews{G2453}, Behold{G1492} your{G5216} King{G3588}!

Then{G5119} delivered he{G3860} him{G846} therefore{G3767} unto them{G846} to{G2443} be crucified{G4717}. And{G1161} they took{G3880} Jesus{G3588}, and{G2532} led{G520} him away{G520}.

And{G2532} he bearing{G941} his{G846} cross{G3588} went forth{G1831} into{G1519} a place{G5117} called{G3004} the place of a skull{G2898}, which{G3739} is called{G3004} in the Hebrew{G1447} Golgotha{G1115}:

Where{G3699} they crucified{G4717} him{G846}and{G2532} two{G1417} other{G243} with{G3326} him{G846}, on either{G1782} side one{G1782}, and{G1161} Jesus{G3588} in the midst{G3319}.UNSURE: Since "enteuthen kai enteuthen" is an idomatic phrase, how to place it.

And{G1161} Pilate{G3588} wrote{G1125} a title{G5102}, and{G2532} put{G5087} it on{G1909} the cross{G3588}. And{G1161} the writing{G1125} was{G2258}, JESUS{G2424} OF NAZARETH{G3588} THE KING{G3588} OF THE JEWS{G2453}.

This{G5126} title{G3588} then{G3767} read{G314} many{G4183} of the Jews{G2453}: for{G3754} the place{G3588} where{G3699} Jesus{G3588} was{G2258} crucified was{G4717} nigh{G1451} to the city{G3588}: and{G2532} it was{G2258} written{G1125} in Hebrew{G1447}, and Greek{G1676}, and Latin{G4515}.

Then{G3767} said{G3004} the chief priests{G3588} of the Jews{G2453} to Pilate{G3588}, Write{G1125} not{G3361}, The King{G3588} of the Jews{G2453}; but{G235} that{G3754} he{G1565} said{G2036}, I am{G1510} King{G935} of the Jews{G2453}.

Then{G3767} the soldiers{G4757}, when{G3753} they had crucified{G4717} Jesus{G3588}, took{G2983} his{G846} garments{G3588}, and{G2532} made{G4160} four{G5064} parts{G3313}, to every{G1538} soldier{G4757} a part{G3313}; and also{G2532} his coat{G3588}: now{G1161} the coat{G3588} was{G2258} without seam{G729}, woven{G5307} from{G1537} the top{G509} throughout{G3650}.

They said{G2036} therefore{G3767} among{G4314} themselves{G240}, Let us{G4977} not{G3361} rend{G4977} it{G846}, but{G235} cast lots{G2975} for{G4012} it{G846}, whose{G5101} it shall be{G2071}: that{G2443} the scripture{G3588} might be fulfilled{G4137}, which saith{G3004}, They parted{G1266} my{G3450} raiment{G3588} among them{G1438}, and{G2532} for{G1909} my{G3450} vesture{G3588} they did cast{G906} lots{G2819}. These things{G5023} therefore{G3767} the soldiers{G4757} did{G4160}.

Now{G1161} there stood{G2476} by{G3844} the cross{G3588} of Jesus{G3588} his{G846} mother{G3588}, and{G2532} his{G846} mother's{G3588} sister{G3588}, Mary{G3137} the wife of Cleophas{G3588}, and{G2532} Mary{G3137} Magdalene{G3588}.

When Jesus{G2424} therefore{G3767} saw{G1492} his mother{G3588}, and{G2532} the disciple{G3588} standing by{G3936}, whom{G3739} he loved{G25}, he saith{G3004} unto his{G846} mother{G3588}, Woman{G1135}, behold{G2400} thy{G4675} son{G3588}!

Then{G1534} saith he{G3004} to the disciple{G3588}, Behold{G2400} thy{G4675} mother{G3588}! And{G2532} from{G575} that{G1565} hour{G3588} that disciple{G3588} took{G2983} her{G846} unto{G1519} his own{G2398} home.

After{G3326} this{G5124}, Jesus{G3588} knowing{G1492} that{G3754} all things{G3956} were now{G2235} accomplished{G5055}, that{G2443} the scripture{G3588} might be fulfilled{G5048}, saith{G3004}, I thirst{G1372}.

Now{G3767} there was set{G2749} a vessel{G4632} full{G3324} of vinegar{G3690}: and{G1161} they filled{G4130} a spunge{G4699} with vinegar{G3690}, and{G2532} put{G4060} it upon hyssop{G5301}, and put{G4374} it to his{G846} mouth{G3588}.

When{G3753} Jesus{G3588} therefore{G3767} had received{G2983} the vinegar{G3588}, he said{G2036}, It is finished{G5055}: and{G2532} he bowed{G2827} his head{G3588}, and gave up{G3860} the ghost{G3588}.

The Jews{G2453} therefore{G3767}, because{G1893} it was{G2258} the preparation{G3904}, that{G2443} the bodies{G3588} should{G3306} not{G3361} remain{G3306} upon{G1909} the cross{G3588} on{G1722} the sabbath day{G3588}, (for{G1063} that{G1565} sabbath day{G3588} was{G2258} an high{G3173} day{G3588},) besought{G2065} Pilate{G3588} that{G2443} their{G846} legs{G3588} might be broken{G2608}, and{G2532} that they might be taken away{G142}.
Then{G3767} came{G2064} the soldiers{G3588}, and{G2532} brake{G2608} the legs{G3588} of the first{G4413}, and{G2532} of the other{G243} which{G3588} was crucified{G4957} with him{G846}.
But{G1161} when{G5613} they came{G2064} to{G1909} Jesus{G3588}, and saw that{G1492} he{G846} was dead{G2348} already{G2235}, they brake{G2608} not{G3756} his{G846} legs{G3588}:
But{G235} one{G1520} of the soldiers{G3588} with a spear{G3057} pierced{G3572} his{G846} side{G3588}, and{G2532} forthwith{G2117} came there out{G1831} blood{G129} and{G2532} water{G5204}.

And{G2532} he{G3588} that saw{G3708} it bare record{G3140}, and{G2532} his{G846} record{G3588} is{G2076} true{G228}: and he{G2548} knoweth{G1492} that{G3754} he saith{G3004} true{G227}, that{G2443} ye{G5210} might believe{G4100}.
For{G1063} these things{G5023} were done{G1096}, that{G2443} the scripture{G3588} should be fulfilled{G4137}, A bone{G3747} of him{G846} shall{G4937} not{G3756} be broken{G4937}.
And{G2532} again{G3825} another{G2087} scripture{G1124} saith{G3004}, They shall look{G3700} on{G1519} him whom{G3739} they pierced{G1574}.

And{G1161} after{G3326} this{G5023} Joseph{G2501} of{G575} Arimathaea{G707}, being{G5607} a disciple{G3101} of Jesus{G3588}, but{G1161} secretly{G2928} for{G1223} fear{G3588} of the Jews{G2453}, besought{G2065} Pilate{G3588} that{G2443} he might take away{G142} the body{G3588} of Jesus{G3588}: and{G2532} Pilate{G3588} gave{G2010} him leave{G2010}. And{G1161} there came{G2064} also{G2532} Nicodemus{G3530}, which{G3588} at the first{G4413} came{G2064} to{G4314} Jesus{G3588} by night{G3571}, and brought{G5342} a mixture{G3395} of myrrh{G4666} and{G2532} aloes{G250}, about{G5616} an hundred{G1540} pound{G3046} weight.

Then{G3767} took they{G2983} the body{G3588} of Jesus{G3588}, and{G2532} wound{G1210} it{G846} in linen clothes{G3608} with{G3326} the spices{G3588}as{G2531} the manner{G1485} of the Jews{G2453} is{G2076} to bury{G1779}.

Now{G1161} in{G1722} the place{G3588} where{G3699} he was crucified{G4717} there was{G2258} a garden{G2779}; and{G2532} in{G1722} the garden{G3588} a new{G2537} sepulchre{G3419}, wherein{G1722} was{G3739} never man{G3762} yet{G3764} laid{G5087}.
